src:
Dešanov spisak: Povratak Mendija posle godinu dana, ponovo bez Dembelea
Biće dovoljno za overu EURA

07 Nov 2019


Francuzi još nisu overili plasman na EURO 2020, ali to će svakako učiniti već u prvom meču poslednjeg reprezentativnog prozora u ovoj godini. Četa Didije Dešana ima četiri boda više od trećeplasiranog Islanda i pobedom protiv Moldavije 14. novembra prebrinuće sve brige.

Bez obzira što im rivali nisu dorasli (posle Moldavije Francuzi gostuju Albaniji) selektor aktuelnih šampiona sveta nije želeo da previše meša karte i kombinuje, te se oslonio na proverene snage. Na spisku nema povređenih Pola Pogba, Uga Lorisa, Samjuela Umtitija, Lukasa Ernandeza, Florana Tovana... Svi ostali nosioci uglavnom su tu, ne računajući Usmana Dembelea, kog ovoga puta nema u akciji odlukom selektora.
Veliki povratak imaće Benžaman Mendi, kog zbog raznih povreda nije bilo u timu više od godinu dana. 
Francuzi su u poslednjem meču kod kuće kiksnuli (sa Turskom 1:1), zbog čega su propustili šansu da se još pre mesec dana plasiraju na Evropski šampionat. Novu šansu sasvim izvesno neće prokockati...

Golmani: Alfons Areola (Real M), Majk Menjan (Lil), Stiv Mandanda (Marselj).
Defanzivci: Lukas Dinj (Everton), Leo Dubua (Nant), Presnel Kimpembe (PSŽ), Kleman Lengle (Barselona), Benžaman Mendi (Mančester Siti), Benžaman Pavar (Bajern), Rafael Varan (Real Madrid), Kurt Zuma (Čelsi).
Vezni red: Ngolo Kante (Čelsi), Blez Matuidi (Juventus), Tongi Ndombele (Totenhem), Musa Sisoko (Totenhem), Korentan Toliso (Bajern).
Napadači: Visam Ben Jeder (Monako), Kingsli Koman (Bajern), Nabil Fekir (Betis), Olivije Žiru (Čelsi), Antoan Grizman (Barselona), Toma Lemar (Atletiko Madrid), Kilijan Mbape (PSŽ).
text:
Deschan's List: Mendi's return after a year, again without Dembele
It will be enough to certify EURA

07 Nov 2019


The French have not yet certified their placement at EURO 2020, but they will certainly do so in the first match of the last representative window this year. Didier Deshan's troupe is four points ahead of third-ranked Iceland and a win against Moldova on November 14 will take away all concerns.

Although their rivals did not grow up (after Moldova, the French are visiting Albania), the current world champions' selector did not want to mix and match the cards too much, and relied on proven strengths. There are no injured Paul Pogba, Hugo Loris, Samuel Umtiti, Lukas Ernandez, Floran Tovan ... All other carriers are mostly there, except for Usman Dembele, who is out of action this time by the selectors' decision.
The big comeback will be Benjamin Bendy, who has not been on the team for more than a year due to various injuries.
The French made the home match in the last match (with Turkey 1: 1), which is why they missed the chance to qualify for the European Championship a month ago. The new chance will certainly not be missed ...

Goalkeepers: Alfons Areola (Real M), Mike Menian (Lille), Steve Mandanda (Marseille).
Defenders: Lucas Dignit (Everton), Leo Dubua (Nantes), Presnel Kimpembe (PSG), Cleman Langle (Barcelona), Benjamin Bendyman (Bayern), Rafael Varan (Real Madrid), Kurt Zuma (Chelsea) ).
Liaison Office: Ngolo Kante (Chelsea), Blaise Matuidi (Juventus), Toni Ndombele (Tottenham), Musa Sissoko (Tottenham), Correntan Toliso (Bayern).
Forwards: Visam Ben Jeder (Monaco), Kingsley Coman (Bayern), Nabil Fekir (Betis), Olivier Giroud (Chelsea), Antoine Grizman (Barcelona), Thomas Lemar (Atletico Madrid), Cilian Mbape (PSG).
